findPrimaryType() can return null. This needs to be tested. In fact I wonder why
this is checked.
This is a trivial fix for M6. Set as critical because it looks like the bug
81497 is not fixed and it is fixed.

Apply on HEAD

The related bug is bug 81797, not bug 81497.
